item.title: Migrate your site from Drupal 7 To Drupal 9?
item.description: In this article, we are going to see what are the important things you need to understand for the migration of your Drupal 7 site to the Drupal 9 site. And if you see from your Business perspective, Drupal 7 was launched nine years ago, and this is the perfect time for some reassessment of the needs of site users & content managers. And if you see from Drupalâ€™s end, Initially, Drupal 7 end of li
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Drupal 7 to Drupal 8/9 Audits
item.description: Migration from Drupal 7 to Drupal 8/9 is more of a re-build than a simple upgrade. We can move the content. users and other configuration with the help of core system, But still their will be a need to re-write custom modules or themes and some times contrib ones as well. By having a list which helps us to Audit any D7 Project to Drupal 8/9 migration would help start quick.
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
